secret_rule: Only items that are typically used in a board game can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "dice" and "game pieces".
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "playing cards"?
Yes, you can bring playing cards.
I'll make a new guess. Can I bring "board game components"?
Yes, you can bring board game components.
I'll make a new guess. Can I bring "tokens"?
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "chess pieces"?
Yes, you can bring chess pieces.

Based on the examples and the responses from the Game Master, the secret rule seems to be that you can bring any items that are associated with games. This includes items like "dice," "playing cards," "board game components," "tokens," and "chess pieces," all of which are components or accessories commonly used in various types of games.

Therefore, my best guess about the rule is: "You can bring any items that are used as components or accessories in games."
